section.title: purchase orders releasing by agent Post Purchase Orders by Agent
section.para: To release Purchase Orders by Agent, select the "Release Purchase Orders by Agent" option. The following screen will appear:
When releasing Purchase Orders by Agent, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to release Purchase Orders for all Purchasing Agents.
Specify Purchasing Agent whose Purchase Orders you want to release. Users may be designated as Purchasing Agents at the system level.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Releases Purchase Orders using the specified parameters.
